mapper.select: select bgg.id, bgg.user_id, bgg.game_id, bgg.grade, bgg.init_time, bu.username as user_name, bu.icon as user_icon from bbs_game_grade bgg left join bbs_user bu on bu.id = bgg.user_id where bgg.grade = ( select max(grade) from bbs_game_grade where game_id = #{gameId} order by init_time ) limit 1

select bgg.id, bgg.user_id, bgg.game_id, bgg.grade, bgg.init_time, bu.username as user_name, bu.icon as user_icon from bbs_game_grade bgg left join bbs_user bu on bu.id = bgg.user_id where bgg.game_id = #{gameId} order by bgg.grade desc

select bgg.user_id, sum(bgg.grade) as sum_grade, bu.username as user_name, bu.icon as user_icon from bbs_game_grade bgg, bbs_user bu where bu.id = bgg.user_id group by bgg.user_id order by sum_grade desc limit 10
